mapper.select: SELECT MBR_ID , OCBCOM_LGN_ID , CI_NO , MBR_KOR_NM , CARD_NO , SYW_MBR_ID , EVS_MBR_ID FROM MBRT_MBR_ID_MST WHERE ${uploadProgress.columnName} IN (SELECT COLUMN1 FROM TMP_${uploadProgress.pageId}_${uploadProgress.username}) OFFSET ${offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT ${limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT MBR_ID , OCBCOM_LGN_ID , CI_NO , MBR_KOR_NM , CARD_NO , SYW_MBR_ID , EVS_MBR_ID FROM MBRT_MBR_ID_MST WHERE ${uploadProgress.columnName} IN (SELECT COLUMN1 FROM TMP_${uploadProgress.pageId}_${uploadProgress.username}) LIMIT ${offset}, ${limit}
